title: That moment you do well and worry nerfs are inbound.
body:
This happen to anyone else?  Like you start winning games as your primary champion and you worry that it means they will soon be deemed "too good" and get some back breaking nerfs (because they aren't LCS picks).

Like i know it's just that the people i'm playing against are failing hard to punish my choices, but damn if it isn't terrifying to be winning 80% or more of your "bad match ups".

replies.body: I would be more worried if my main started being pick banned more often that a nerf is incoming.
If you main irelia or akali you dont have to worry
If you think Sona is gonna get nerfed, you can honestly relax. Tank Supports are consisting of the top tier currently. And she's sitting at a healthy 50% winrate.

> [{quoted}](name=Balterein,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QAzGvJiV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-01T01:58:29.198+0000)
>
> If you think Sona is gonna get nerfed, you can honestly relax. Tank Supports are consisting of the top tier currently. And she's sitting at a healthy 50% winrate.

Oh i know it's stupid, but it's one of those "knowing my luck" kind of deals.

I'm curious to see how good/ bad she will be during preseason with the changes they are putting in.
